content:
Hi All,

I am trying to create sample application using AllScripts FHIR.
I created an FHIR application in AllScript.
For testing purpose I am trying to use sandboxes provided below link (https://developer.allscripts.com/Content/fhir/content/FHIR_Sandboxes)

I tried sandboxes provided above link. No sand box authorize urls and token urls not working,

I am unable to find the contact email related to Developer issues regarding AllSCripts.

Can you please help this issue.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Jeffrey Danford

We have same issue and we have recently written to Jeff but no response. There is not a single working URL in their sandbox. Please help.
